page.title: 01Gazetteer.
page.content: This area of Hampshire is situated between the ever growing suburbs of{ {Winchester}and{Eastleigh}. It is comprised of undulating countryside around{Hursley}and{Pitt Down}. It is farming country , mostly owned by one farm . To the south-eastern corner of the area is the little hamlet of{ {Standon}lived in only by farm workers. Just outside the area is the nearest village , that of{Hursley}, which is dominated by an International Business Machines complex in the old Hursley Manor . The area we are dealing with , has only a few farms , and an sixteenth century mansion , called {Merdon Manor}, on the chalk grassland. Two thousand years ago the situation was different , as there is an Iron Age Fort ,{Merdon Castle}. So , the area is sparsley populated , farming is the only industry .
